overview: Having recently ended an affair with his Ethics Professor, Nathan is looking for love online in the midst of the Lockdown. But progress is slow. Encountering only white guys wanting to play “daddy” on Grindr, he flips over to his favorite online video game, where he dives in as his avatar -- Jakia Capri of the House of Targaryen. A message from a fellow gamer may turn out to be just the kind of conversation he didn’t know he was looking for.
title: Gayme On
